mapper.select: select rownum, id, member_id as memberId, member_name as memberName, title, datetime, replies, likes, views from post where category=#{category} AND likes >= #{likes} order by id desc OFFSET (#{pageDto.currentPage}-1)*#{pageDto.limit} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{pageDto.limit} ROWS ONLY
select id, category, content, title, member_id as memberId, member_name as memberName, views, likes, datetime, replies from post where id = #{id}
select id, member_id as memberId, member_name as memberName, post_id, content, datetime, likes from reply where post_id = #{postId}
select id, member_name as memberName, title, datetime, replies, likes, views from post where likes >= #{likes} AND (category = #{category}) order by id desc
select id, member_name as memberName, title, datetime, replies, likes, views from post where (${searchCol} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') AND (category = #{category}) order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into post ( id, member_id, member_name, category, title, content ) values ( seq_post.nextval, #{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content} )
insert into reply ( id, member_id, member_name, post_id, content ) values ( seq_reply.nextval, #{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{postId}, #{content} )
